info.name: about:blank Moezilla Firefox
info.description:
image from http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/80387688/
japanese letters means 'Moezilla Firefox'.
Yes, it's 'moe', called a cute girl in japan. (no mistake!)

same as my first but for widescreen 1920x1200, 2560x1600 and higher
also with some rays.

checkout also my 'About' dialog Moezilla Firefox style

data.title: Since i own a ws panel i am looking for background
